  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Package plasystem_functions

package plasystem_functions
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CartTableRenderer
    Utility class for applying custom rendering to a cart table in the PlaSystem application.
    DBConnection
    Utility class for establishing and managing a connection to the SQLite database used by the PlaSystem application.
    ErrorValueHandling
    Utility class for validating numeric input strings in the PlaSystem application.
    FrameExporter
    Utility class for exporting the content of a JFrame as a PNG image in the PlaSystem application.
    InventoryReportGenerator
    Utility class for generating inventory reports in CSV format for the PlaSystem application.
    MonthConverter
    Utility class for converting month names to their two-digit numeric equivalents in the PlaSystem application.
    ProductData
    Represents a product entity in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the Product table.
    ProductDataManager
    Manages product data in the PlaSystem database, providing functionality to add, edit, delete, and load products, as well as update a JTable with product information.
    ProductRowSelector
    Utility class for retrieving data from the selected row of a JTable as a ProductData object in the PlaSystem application.
    ProductTableRenderer
    Utility class for formatting and dynamically sizing columns in a JTable displaying product data in the PlaSystem application.
    RestockData
    Represents a single restocking event in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the Restock table.
    RestockDataManager
    Manages restocking operations in the PlaSystem database, including creating, retrieving, and deleting restock events.
    RestockHistoryTableRenderer
    Custom table renderer for the restock history table in the PlaSystem application.
    RestockItemData
    Represents an item restocked during a restocking event in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the RestockItems table.
    RestockReportGenerator
    Utility class for generating restock reports in CSV format for the PlaSystem application.
    RestockTableRenderer
    Custom renderer for the restock table in the PlaSystem application, dynamically adjusting column widths to fit content.
    RoleBasedAccessControl
    Utility class for applying role-based access control in the PlaSystem application.
    TransactionData
    Represents a transaction in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the Transactions table.
    TransactionDataManager
    Manages transaction data in the PlaSystem database, providing functionality to add, load, and delete transactions, including their items, and update product quantities.
    TransactionHistoryTableRenderer
    Custom renderer for the transaction history table in the PlaSystem application.
    TransactionHistoryTableRenderer.DecimalFormatRenderer
    Custom renderer to format numeric values to two decimal places in table cells.
    TransactionItemData
    Represents an item in a transaction in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the TransactionItems table.
    TransactionReportGenerator
    Utility class for generating transaction reports in CSV format for the PlaSystem application.
    UserAccountData
    Represents a user account in the PlaSystem database, mapping to the UserAccount table.
    UserAccountDataManager
    Manages user account data in the PlaSystem database, providing functionality to add, load, update, delete, and validate user accounts.
